Address: 73 Dairy Paddock Lane Cobram East VIC 3644
Description:
160 Acres - Water Views - River Access - Bush Setting
Rare water front land situated between Cobram and Yarrawonga beside the Mighty Murray River. 160 acres currently under orchard (including cherries). It has several excellent home sites with water frontage. (STCA) Fronts state forest with a small beach and boat access to the Murray River. Create your dream here! Irrigation water on the property with 320 megalitres from spear point and 158 megalitre delivery share from the creek with pump. Irrigation pipes throughout the property. Possible subdivision potential (STCA). Excellent soils. Keep the orchard for some income or lifestyle block, hobby farm. Choices galore. A rare opportunity to purchase a waterfront property.
These details have been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
Quiet Country Living
On a large 2225sqm block this 3 bedroom home is a great opportunity for first home buyers or investment opportunity. The master bedroom has built in robe, ceiling fan and reverse cycle air conditioner. Bedroom two has built in robe and ceiling fan. Bedroom 3 leads off second living area with ceiling fan also. The open plan kitchen, dining and lounge area is spacious also with ceiling fan and reverse cycle air conditioning with two sliding glass doors leading to the outside. Outside the large 6x6m shed has a tilt-a-door and side access door with the floor concreted and power is also available. The massive yard has low maintenance gardens but mainly a blank canvas to let your imagination guide you.

SMALL DAIRY / LIFESTYLE / HOBBY

12 swing over dairy complete with full feed system, milk vat and currently in operation.
Large concrete feed pad ( 400 cows ).
3/4 bedroom home with open plan kitchen / meals / living.
Good sundry shedding including hay sheds and machinery sheds etc.
You won't find better value 12 minutes from Cobram!
This farm can be used for any farming practise with quality soils and great layout.

Description:
"Wrenhaven" Koonoomoo Oasis - 61 Acres
This unique, income-producing lifestyle property offers privacy and tranquility over a fantastic 61 acres (24.6 hectares). It is peaceful and secluded, yet still only 10 minutes from town. The charming period homestead boasts a superb outlook over the beautiful natural surrounds, incorporating an expansive lagoon and 250 year old Murray River Gums. Follow the walking tracks to the lovely campfire and sitting areas positioned around the lagoon where you can relax, listen to the delightful sounds of the abundant native wildlife and enjoy the magnificent sunsets.
The home features a country style kitchen, formal dining area and a generous lounge, plus evaporative cooling. There are three large bedrooms plus an attached bungalow with it's own shower & toilet. High ceilings, decorative ceiling roses, picture rails and feature lead lighting add to the home's overall charm.
Double carport, 3 bay machinery shed, garden shed, domestic bore (drinking water) and rainwater tanks. There is a Hobby Nursery, and also potential for any home-based business. Approximately 55 acres of choice farming land (currently leased for cropping & grazing), 2.5 megalitres of high reliability water and 1.06 delivery share.
Call today to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Fantastic Lifestyle Property
Established on an appealing one acre block in the sought after Koonoomoo within close proximity to the Murray River and tourist towns of Cobram and Tocumwal.
Extensively renovated home with all the comforts to enjoy a relaxed, semi rural lifestyle. Well appointed kitchen with large walk-in pantry, two living areas, four generous bedrooms all with built-in robes and the main with ceiling fan. Renovated bathroom, ensuite and laundry, ducted reverse cycle air conditioning throughout and a large double lockup garage under roof-line with direct house access.
Fantastic outdoor entertaining area ideal for large family gatherings, and overlooking the superb in-ground pool. Duel road frontage with easy vehicle/caravan/truck access to the back yard, large lockup shed, domestic bore and automated sprinkler system.
An excellent property with lots to offer and a must to inspect.

Description:
With 10 minutes to Cobram this 1.82ha property is ready for the horse lover!
Upon entrance this property is well presented with beautiful low maintenance gardens well supplied with water from the in place sprinkler system, good fencing and 4 bay carport.
The 3 bedroom weatherboard home consists of
a new kitchen with black wood cabinetry, gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher, walk in pantry and plenty of cupboards.
You will have room to move with the new extension consisting of a large meals/family room with RC/SS, ceiling fans and slider to outside, there is also a separate cosy formal lounge.
Master bedroom has built in robes and RC/SS whilst the 2 remaining bedrooms are of good size.
Bathroom consists of a vanity and shower with a separate toilet.
The exterior of the property has 4 good size paddocks, with electric fencing, 3 stables, tack room and tie up area, 3 bay machinery shed with power and workbenches.
This property comes with approximately 8,000 gallons in rainwater tanks and 2 megs of stock and domestic along with 7 megs of high reliability water.
Book your inspection today, you wont be disappointed!

Description:
Lifestyle and Income - 20 acres
Fronting the Torgannah Lagoon in the popular Murray River area of Koonoomoo, this superb property offers a relaxed rural lifestyle in a fantastic location. The five bedroom, ranch-style residence caters for all family needs.
Large open living area, Jarrah kitchen with granite bench tops and a large stainless steel oven, and a second lounge/living area. Spacious ensuite, and main bathroom with a spa. Quality appointments throughout, nine foot ceilings, ducted gas heating, ducted cooling, and a large 4-vehicle garage with a storage room and internal access.
Lovely landscaped surrounds incorporating a superb pool and outdoor living area. Excellent 14m x 10m shed - perfect for the tradesman. Domestic bore, pumping licence from the lagoon, and well fenced & irrigated paddocks. Dog runs and stock yards. Great outdoor activities, fishing and canoeing are easily accessible with the convenience of the Torgannah Lagoon being at your door step. This property is an absolute must to inspect.

Description:
20 Acres - Impressive Home - Horse Facilities
Looking for a property with a fabulous home as well as facilities to keep and train your horses? Look no further - here it is! Set on 20 acres is this stunningly renovated weatherboard home.
Large open plan living area with stylish black kitchen, beautiful timber floors and opening to a sheltered entertaining deck. Three carpeted bedrooms, main with walk in robe and luxury ensuite featuring polished bluestone and a double shower. Ducted reverse cycle heating and cooling, and solar heat pump hot water service. Wide verandahs.
Deep bore for water to house and troughs. Horse facilities include a fully floodlit arena, round yard, tack room, horse yards, hay shed and machinery shed. Excellent paddock structure, great fences, established trees and lawns.

Description:
Gorgeous 10 acre lifestyle retreat
This impressive cottage enjoys sweeping bullnose verandahs overlooking almost 10 acres of land and offers all the features from yesteryear including high ceilings and decorative cornices but with the modern comforts of today. The lounge and meals areas are generous in size with the meals opening onto the verandah through double french doors. The timber kitchen has an abundance of bench space with electric oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher. The space then opens onto the family room which enjoys uninterrupted and seamless views of the inground swimming pool. All three bedrooms are spacious in size and offer built in robes with an ensuite with corner spa attached to the master bedroom. There are also 8 panels of solar electricity. Externally there is an alfresco area and good sized shedding which part of has currently been set up for a commercial kitchen and is available for sale separately if required. There are three paddocks in all which are able to be irrigated. There is 5 megs of water and a domestic bore. This property offers a wonderful lifestyle with its gorgeous garden and established tree setting and needs to be inspected to truly appreciate what is on offer.

Description:
Semi rural living
Positioned in Yarroweyah, which is only minutes from Cobram, this three bedroom brick veneer home offers two separate living areas and is true value for money! The kitchen is generous in size and comprises ample bench space, dishwasher, electric oven with separate grill, gas hot plates and corner pantry. It overlooks the meals/family area which opens onto a sensational decked outdoor entertainment area. All three bedrooms have built in robes with the master bedroom having the added convenience of a two way bathroom. Externally there are two sheds, double carport and lovely garden surrounds. This home has access to town water as well as bore water to maintain the lawns and gardens. With a lot to offer, make an inspection to view today.

Description:
Rural Lifestyle
• Excellent rural setting in the heart of Koonoomoo
• This well presented 3bedroom home is positioned on 4.25 Acres (1.72 Ha) approx., with quality bore water servicing house and gardens
• Constructed in 1997 this home has a well appointed kitchen, good size lounge, timber heating and is surrounded by well established trees

Description:
Enjoy the resort style entertaining
Serene and tranquil, this lifestyle property comes with just over 9 acres of land and is only 10 minutes drive from Cobram. This fantastic three bedroom plus study renovated weatherboard family home has something to offer the entire family. Inside the home you will find a separate meals and large lounge room with solid fuel heater, but there is also gas ducted heating throughout. The master bedroom features its own small walk in robe and the room for a future ensuite, with the vanity, shower and toilet just waiting to be all connected by its new owners. The remaining two bedrooms and study are generous in size. The recently renovated family bathroom has a shower, separate bath and vanity. The laundry has also been renovated and features plenty of storage space and leads to a lovely sitting area on the verandah to enjoy a cup of tea in the morning sun. Perfect for those who love to entertain the home features a modern galley style kitchen with dishwasher, electric oven and gas cooktop with french door leading to the awesome outdoor entertaining area. Perfect for all year round entertaining this large area is undercover and has its own outdoor kitchen which leads to the undercover spa that overlooks the swimming pool. The perfect oasis! The home still has some things to finish, giving the new owners the chance to put their final stamp on their new home. Externally there is plenty of shedding, including a Man Cave with concrete floor and power, perfect for the home handy man. There is also a She Cave that has to be seen to be believed! An absolutely stunning fully equipped shed. There are approximately 8 paddocks that are currently being used to agist horses along with secure pens which could be used for dogs or chickens. Properties like this one don't come up often, don't miss out book an inspection today.

Description:
How's this for serenity?
This gorgeous lifestyle property set on approximately 3.28 acres is nestled amongst beautiful garden surrounds. The homestead offers two spacious living areas centrally located in the home. Functional kitchen boasting cathedral ceilings, oven, cooktop, dishwasher and walk in pantry. Five bedrooms in total, two with full ensuite's and all with built in robes/walk in robes. Although the other three bedrooms have to share the family bathroom it is fitted out with a large corner spa and separate shower. The home also includes 9ft ceilings, 10K/w solar electricity unit, evaporative air conditioning and zoned electric floor heating. Externally there is a decked outdoor entertaining area and a huge shed which is approximately 24m x 10m with oversized roller doors and will fit all those big boy toys. The property has a domestic bore which supplies the house and garden including the mini orchard which has a little of everything including cherries, almonds, chestnuts and lots more.

Description:
Appealing Yarroweyah Farmlet ~ 22 Acres
The Perfect Hobby Block.
Appealing irrigation block with the ability to generate income. Country style three bedroom weatherboard house with loads of potential in a lovely, treed setting.
Features open kitchen/meals/living area, good size bedrooms, sunroom and study. Extensive shedding and workshop areas, large feature dam with fish. Well fenced, lasered paddocks & recycle dam. It also has a Telstra tower in the corner of the property generating immediate income.
A productive and appealing block in a great location handy to town.
Property Code: 2575

Description:
Farming - Lifestyle - Dairy - Irrigation
100 acres or 40.50 Ha situated between Cobram and Yarroweyah on Montgomery Road.
DAIRY FARM, CROPPING/GRAZING/IRRIGATION PROPERTY
● Three bedroom renovated timber family home with open plan living
and updated kitchen.
● The farm is 80% lasered with a good mix of permanent pasture and
annuals all growing in Moira sandy loam soils. The farm has
recently been re-fenced with good laneways.
● 18 aside dairy complete with modern plant, in-bale feed system,
4000 litre vat, 200 cow yard with good drafting facilities and
very good calf rearing facilities.
● Stock and domestic deep lead bore supplying troughs, dairy
and home. GMW delivery share in place.
● Until recently this property was in full production. It would
make a great investment property and agistment block.
● Modern two bedroom cottage that is less than five years old and
was recently rented at approx $320 per week
● Being sold in conjunction with Sallan Realty of Cobram
Please call Sharon Cain 0358 712029
